p: The results are given as a mean value from three separate experiments. All values are expressed as a mean ± SD. Statistical differences between bacteria exposed to antibiotics, S. virgaurea extract and unexposed bacteria were analyzed using the non-parametric Kruskal–Wallis test, followed by Dunn’s multiple comparison test. Statistical calculations were made using STATISTICA 13.1 (Stat Soft, Krakow, Poland). p values ≤ 0.05 were considered to be statistically significant.
